favicon.ico usage

Place `favicon.ico` at your app's public root so the server serves it at `/favicon.ico`.

Examples:
- Vite/React: put it in `public/favicon.ico`
- Next.js: put it in `public/favicon.ico`
- CRA: put it in `public/favicon.ico`

Hard reload if it doesn't update:
- Chrome: Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+R
